  index: "english_example",
  settings: {
    analysis: {
      filter: {
        english_stop: {
          type: "stop",
          stopwords: "_english_",
        },
        english_keywords: {
          type: "keyword_marker",
          keywords: ["example"],
        },
        english_stemmer: {
          type: "stemmer",
          language: "english",
        },
        english_possessive_stemmer: {
          type: "stemmer",
          language: "possessive_english",
        },
      },
      analyzer: {
        rebuilt_english: {
          tokenizer: "standard",
          filter: [
            "english_possessive_stemmer",
            "lowercase",
            "english_stop",
            "english_keywords",
            "english_stemmer",
          ],
        },
      },
    },
  },
});
